articles.title: Maggie Cheung is now on Red Note
articles.content: In this garden of life, we walk together. Whether the road is smooth or rough, let's share the scenery of this journey together," she expressed. "Timing is very personal. When you feel like it's the right moment, then it is," she said. Maggie also revealed that she will be sharing various new things on her account, including "new things, fun things, useful things, beautiful things, meaningful things, things worth learning, things worth...

articles.title: Donald Trump Reveals What He Told Melania After Hunter Bidenâ€™s Epstein Relationship Comments
articles.content: President Donald Trump has shared his reaction to first lady Melania Trumpâ€™s $1 billion defamation threat against former President Joe Bidenâ€™s son Hunter Biden. Melania Trumpâ€™s lawyer, Alejandro Brito, denied the claims in an Aug. 6 letter addressed to Hunter Biden and his attorney, Abbe Lowell. The letter was first reported Wednesday by Fox News Digital
